channel.title: slug on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in slug on Barefoot Rob

item.title: san antonio rally
item.description: (transcribed from my diary) [except for text in brackets] 29-31 october 1999 5:31am Saturday 30 October 1999 Oh my god it’s 5:21 am. I’m at San Antonio Rally. After work I was all “Ohshit! I didn’t get the van!” [it would be a very unfortunate situation to have 12 youth ready to go to San Antonio and me have to say, “um, I forgot to pick up the van from the rental place.
